snippet: Phylos Bioscience is unveiling a marijuana guide called Galaxy, offering people a way to see how Sweet Island Skunk might be related to Humboldt OG.
abstract: Biotechnology start-up Phylos Bioscience is offering online interactive guide called Galaxy that offers visualization of genetic relationships between around 1,000 types of marijuana; guide is outgrowth of Cannabis Evolution Project, joint venture between company and American Museum of Natural History in New York.
lead_paragraph: Phylos Bioscience is unveiling a marijuana guide called Galaxy, offering people a way to see how Sweet Island Skunk might be related to Humboldt OG.

headline.main: Start-Up Plans 3-D Visualizations of Pot Strains, Using Genetic Data
headline.print_headline: Start-Up Plans 3-D Images of Strains of Marijuana
